sent.orig: We serve coconut juice、 orange juice、 pineapple juice、 lemon juice、 grape juice、 watermelon juice and soon.
sent.trans: 我们餐厅有椰子汁、汁、萝汁、檬汁、萄汁、瓜汁等饮料。

sent.orig: Waiter: We have fresh orange juice, tomato juice, watermelon juice, carrot juice, juice, and cucumber juice.
sent.trans: 男店员：我们有鲜榨橙汁、番茄汁、西瓜汁、胡萝卜汁、苹果汁和黄瓜汁。

sent.orig: Juice: mango juice, peach juice, Liu Chengzhi, crystal grape juice, juice Bale, carambola Zhideng.
sent.trans: 果汁系列有：芒果汁，蜜桃汁，柳橙汁，水晶葡萄汁，芭乐汁，杨桃汁等。

sent.orig: Pineaapple Juice, Plum Juice, Lime Juice, orange Juice and Grape Juice, to name only a few.
sent.trans: 菠萝汁、酸梅汁、酸橙汁、橙汁和葡萄汁等等。

sent.orig: Orange juice, grape juice, pineapple juice, coconut water, and watermelon juice.
sent.trans: 橙汁、葡萄汁、椰子汁和西瓜汁。
